COPY
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
January 3> 195?
Mr. M. H. Kennedy, Editor
University of Illinois
Small Homes Council
Memford House
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Kennedy:
Thinks a lot for sending to me these Small Homes Council's
circulars. They are indeed veil prepared, full of infor¬
mation, and easily read. Mrs. Seay and I are enjoying read¬
ing them.
Sincerely,
Maurice F. Seay
MFS/fh
